content: That’s a really good and useful article. At work, I am designing a web app and the scope just got bigger. I will take a step back, use a lot of things from this article and only then I will move on to new features and components. Question: when you start a new project, you do all of this from scratch or do you have general templates for each step/document? It feels like since every project will make use of this structure, some templates would be handy.
